meanings.sent1: The excurrent river flooded the surrounding fields.
meanings.sent2: The excurrent lava slowly oozed from the volcano.
meanings.sent3: The excurrent fountain in the park sprayed water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her excurrent enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The excurrent aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Having a single main stem or trunk that continues to grow upward
meanings.sent1: The excurrent tree towered over the rest of the forest.
meanings.sent2: The excurrent palm tree reached for the sky.
meanings.sent3: The excurrent beanstalk in the story seemed impossible to climb.
meanings.sent4: His excurrent ambition knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The excurrent mountain peak was visible from miles away.
